name: Connect:A connection puzzle
description:
A Brain training puzzle game that makes you smarter.
It is a free and simple, surprisingly addictive puzzle game that you can play in your free time.
Solve more than 1000 stages of puzzles and enjoy yourself while training your brain.


【Overview】
Brain Training Puzzle Connect is a puzzle game that lets you unconsciously train your brain while you play.
Try playing it a bit in your free time.

【How to play】
The rules are simple. Just connect each circle with the lines and set the number in each circle to 0.
If there is a puzzle you just cannot solve, there are some hints to help you.

【Stages】
We prepared 12 levels for a total of 1200 stages.
Although the puzzles start out easy, they get harder and harder as blocks, hook points, warps, and more start appearing!

Thinking carefully will revitalize your brain and train your imagination.
Take advantage of the free hours in your everyday life to make your brain more more supple!
